Title: Yobe gets three MDAs to boost infrastructure, healthcare
Summary: Governor Mai Mala Buni has established three Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) to boost infrastructure and healthcare delivery across the state’s 17 Local Government Areas . According to him, the newly created MDAs are strategic to the state's economy .

Title: My administration will hand over power peaceful in 2027 – Gov Abiodun
Summary: Governor Dapo Abiodun of Ogun State has assured residents of the state that his administration will record a seamless, peaceful and rancour-free transition at the end of his second term in 2027 . Abiodu stated this on Thursday during the Christmas holiday .

Title: Two die as diesel tanker explodes in Lagos on Christmas Day
Summary: Two die as diesel tanker explodes in Lagos on Christmas Day . The explosion occurred in the early hours of today at the Oto-Ijanikin axis, in the vicinity of the Lagos State University of Education (LASUED)

Title: Seven sustain injuries in Lagos/Ibadan Expressway auto crash
Summary: Seven passengers sustained varying degrees of injuries on Christmas Eve . The bus they were travelling in somersaulted due to a tyre burst around the Eledumare area of the Lagos-Ibadan Expressway in Ogun State .

Title: CITN calls for verification of contested tax Acts
Summary: Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (CITN) has called for immediate verification of contested tax Acts . The institute said this followed the recent public discourse that has raised concerns that the new tax laws are unfair .

Title: PDP slams govt over Maiduguri mosque blast
Summary: PDP condemns Christmas Eve explosion at a mosque in Gamboru Market, Maiduguri . The party described the incident as a disturbing reflection of Nigeria’s worsening security situation .

Title: Netanyahu condemns alleged attacks on Christians in Nigeria
Summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu condemns alleged attacks on Christians in Nigeria . Netanyahu calls for an immediate end to what he termed militant assaults on Christian communities . He described the alleged displacement and violence as unacceptable .

Title: Mo Salah shares heartwarming Christmas family picture despite AFCON duties
Summary: Mohamed Salah shares heartwarming Christmas family picture despite AFCON duties . Liverpool and Egypt star is currently preparing for the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) 2025 .

Title: Tinubu greets ex-APC national Chairman, Ganduje at 76
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has congratulated Dr Abdullahi Umar Ganduje on his 76th birthday . He described Dr Ganduja as an astute politician and accomplished administrator who served the country in various positions over the last 50 years . Dr Gandjuje previously served as the National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress, AP

Title: Presidency denies rumour of Gbajabiamila’s replacement as Chief of Staff
Summary: Presidency denies rumour of Gbajabiamila's replacement as Chief of Staff . The Presidency also cautioned members of the media and the public against spreading unverified information .
